exclusion.criterion: Columnar mucosa in the distal esophagus but no intestinal metaplasia on biopsy.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with BE who have undergone endoscopic ablation therapy or enrolled in chemoprevention trials.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has confirmed Barrett's esophagus and meets age criteria, but does not meet exclusion criteria for having undergone endoscopic ablation therapy or being enrolled in a chemoprevention trial.
